all three patients on Monday. Senator Kirsten Gillibrand told US television Sunday she had visited Gabrielle Giffords the previous day and found her`` doing great'' and`` making progress every day.'' Gabrielle Giffords is using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand told NBC's`` Meet The Press'' program.`` It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury,'' she added. opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead, and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come,'' Eric Schmidt said. Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt , too.
